about_the_game:
Our new game is already in development! More girls, more sex, more animations and beautiful locations. Hurry up and add it to your Wishlist and follow our new game!



This version contains two additional features:

1) Cheats — you may control changeable parameters of character and girls with legal tool. It helps to open all pathes and scenes.



2) Events — when you play the College you would have your favourite scenes. This feature helps you to repeat all sex events from the game per one click.





Take all pleasure from the game! This pack is for you!

College Seduction is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on spicy parts of college life. Play as a young teacher who seduces his students, complete tasks of Principal and build your career in College. You may influence on girls with special potions that change their behavior. The choices you make will affect on storylines and lead you to be a Principal of College.



In the beginning you have a trial period of work and you should complete some tasks to be approved.
Girls that surround you have different characters and temperaments so you should remember it when you communicate with them.

Our game contains a quiz part that you may skip or participate in. Some mini-games made game more interesting and more interactive. Additional options are cheats and event, it helps you to repeat scenes and make game easier.




College Seduction is packed with 200+ animations and over 6000 images.
You will play more than 10 hours and the most interesting that you could replay game to open other scenes, girls and paths.
Main Seduction, Office Seduction will be a prequel and other line of the story and be released and sold separately.

This version contains two additional features:

1) Cheats — you may control changeable parameters of character and girls with legal tool. It helps to open all pathes and scenes.



2) Events — when you play the College you would have your favourite scenes. This feature helps you to repeat all sex events from the game per one click.





Take all pleasure from the game! This pack is for you!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.

All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

name: College Seduction Premium Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: College Seduction is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of college life. The game is packed with humor, sex, romance and plot turnings. Play as a young teacher who seduces his students, complete tasks of the Principal and build your career in College.
